snippet: Following is the text of what North Korea says is an apology from Merrill Newman, an American currently detained in North Korea, published by the state-run Korean Central News Agency.
lead_paragraph: Following is the text of what North Korea says is an apology from Merrill Newman, an American currently detained in North Korea, published by the state-run Korean Central News Agency.

headline.main: Text of Apology Attributed to American Detained in North Korea
